title: US Honey Production Data — HoneyProduction
text: data set shows honey production, honey unit price, data state United States 1998 2012.

title: US Honey Production Data — HoneyProduction
text: data frame 626 observations 7 variables. state abbreviation state name US year Year statistics numcol Number honey producing colonies yieldpercol Yield per colony totalprod Total honey production priceperlb Average price per pound prodvalue Value production per 1000 dollars

title: US Honey Production Data — HoneyProduction
text: data source National Agricultural Statistics Service (NASS), Agricultural Statistics Board, U.S. Department Agriculture (data obtained https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/tree/master/data/2018/2018-05-21).

what: honeyproduction: A Package For Exploring Data On Honey Production By States in US From 1998 To 2012 — honeyproduction-package
title: honeyproduction: A Package For Exploring Data On Honey Production By States in US From 1998 To 2012 — honeyproduction-package
text: package contains two numeric functions output summary total honey production state, average value honey state. Meanwhile, also includes function presents overall line graph honey production state time, well function output bar chart, shows price honey state US, selected state highlighted. core information U.S. honey production data displayed multiple directions angles help people better understand data.
